column1: It was honor to attend and speak on the behalf of @JoeBiden at the Stop the Violence Rally at South Carolina State!   "The most powerful non-violent tool in a democratic society is to VOTE!" -John Lewis https://t.co/RuMlxVyDbk

I am having a wonderful time on the Soul of the Nation campaign trail with @JoeBiden !! A big thanks to Bethlehem Baptist Church - College Place for hosting us! It was a beautiful service!! #GoJoeGo #GoVote https://t.co/DWOeAWIpnD
Joining @amjoyshow! https://t.co/dQxYf1dVdZ

Donald Trump is the biggest threat to Dr. King’s legacy! I believe that Joe Biden is the best democratic candidate to beat Trump and therefore protect the causes central to the life’s work of Dr. King! https://t.co/f2d3aOORmh
Happy Founders’ Day to my beloved sorority— Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority Incorporated!!  Thank you Mommy for leading by example! #LegacyAKA https://t.co/cb0HydK88y
ICYMI. https://t.co/Psdbaqr1LA
Amen! https://t.co/Ubyn5NV3bW

Tonight  my prayers are with our troops and their families as reports show Iran launched attacks on U.S. bases in Iraq. I also pray for peace!! The U.S. and Iran must stop needless provocations — too many American lives are at risk.
Grabbing some pastries with @DrBiden at a local coffee shop for the phone bank volunteers in Birmingham!! https://t.co/VkikboYf96
2020 Blessings to all!! https://t.co/N6TZDhAU8I
2019 in review! Thank you for the opportunity to represent you in Congress! https://t.co/hJWlUPWfIe
From the Sewell family to yours have a very Merry Christmas!! https://t.co/P0mV3xzRY7

Tis the season of giving!!  It was great partnering with Community Care Development Network who connected us with the Gunn Family. Ironically Ms. Gunn's deceased brother was a LOYAL volunteer of my campaign. As my Mom would say "It's a blessing to be a blessing! Happy Holidays! https://t.co/08wGb96STl

I had a wonderful time at my Annual Holiday Party on Monday where Mayor @stevenlouisreed was my special guest! Go to my Flickr to check out the pictures!  Happy Holiday's Everyone!!   https://t.co/7aco14oxmw
ICYMI. https://t.co/e3rogurRFC

Honored to represent @MilesCollege at the signing of the FUTURE Act that makes permanent $255 million in annual funding for HBCUs. My district includes 10 HBCUs. By investing in HBCUs we are investing in America’s future! Job well done!! #HBCUs https://t.co/qtoxIHCIPG
Great to hang with my dear friend @AmbassadorRice! Her new book “Tough Love” is a must read! #ToughLove #BlackGirlMagic https://t.co/XACFQ5G3fI
Today House Democrats delivered on trade!! https://t.co/wgjQiQc5fh
Rep. Terri Sewell MTR rebuttal on H.R. 4 https://t.co/UoTOFxczIO via @YouTube
Today HR 4  Final Passage: PASSED 228-187. We even got 1 republican from PA.! #RestoreTheVote https://t.co/r2n0YL5C9x
One step closer to passing HR 4- the Voting Rights Advancement Act! https://t.co/SkRfqrZGHM
We honor all of the foot soldiers of  the Selma to Montgomery March of 1965 by passing HR 4 and restoring the full protections of the VRA. #RestoreTheVote https://t.co/MZ2efxcOpZ
2 days to go! #RestoreTheVote https://t.co/Z4AsH7yHNS
Excited about HR4 coming to the House Floor this week!  Finally restoring the full protections of the Voting Rights Act of 1965!! #RestoreTheVote #RestoreTheVRA https://t.co/jdkwyqLLRQ

Today my committee conducts Day#2 of the Impeachment Inquiry. Damaging testimony about @realDonaldTrump! Our job is to follow the facts where they led us and have the courage to do what we need to do to protect our democracy. #ImpeachmentHearings  #OurInterestNotPolitics https://t.co/xW2mLdIvZV

It’s official!!! I filed my re-election papers yesterday!! Go to https://t.co/gBT3gwifVK to check out my website and campaign video! #TeamSewell #2020 https://t.co/VziNrxmI9w

We mourn the passing of the longest serving African American Congressman Michigan Rep. John Conyers whose more than 50 years of service included the passage of the Voting Rts Act of 1965 and the MLKing Holiday. Our condolences to his family and to his constituents of the Michigan https://t.co/AO0RblXkyz
Our heart aches for the family of Kamille ‘Cupcake’ McKinney whose precious life is mourned by our entire community.  May we pray that justice is served.  https://t.co/4mAfrAFCqL
OMG! Trump COS admits quid quo pro for withholding military aid to Urkraine!! How can we not  investigate and follow the facts where they lead us!! #ForThePeople https://t.co/HkjjvGbW7u
Thanks @AriBerman for reminding us of @RepCummings words about the fight for voting rights! #RIP https://t.co/PJJNYB2huj

With a heavy heart we mourn the passing of our my dear colleague @RepCummings of MD.  Elijah was a giant among us who led with his heart but governed with his love of his district and this country! His legacy will live on!#GoneButNeverForgotten  https://t.co/0FRURcpNuz
The legacy of my  Alabama district demands that we hold the President accountable! No one is above the law! https://t.co/WiTrvlKjnq

#OnThisDay in 2013 the Sup Ct in Shelby vs. Holder gutted the Voting Right Act of 1965 opening the flood gates for states to pass discriminatory voter suppression laws. Let us never forget why we must fight against voter dIscrimination!We must RESTORE THE VRA! #RestoreTheVOTE https://t.co/iOw5v0hjz9
